item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 10, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Tetris in a PDF (729 points | 131 comments)
2. Soldering the Tek way (78 points | 37 comments)
3. WorstFit: Unveiling Hidden Transformers in Windows ANSI (212 points | 47 comments)

19. MixRank (YC S11) Is Hiring Software Engineers Globally ( | hide)
20. Cracking a 512-bit DKIM key for less than $8 in the cloud (765 points | 368 comments)

25. The Seven-Action Documentation Model (72 points | 10 comments)
26. The cases of consumer-grade routers on puny power supplies (57 points | 35 comments)
27. Writing a simple pool allocator in C (274 points | 118 comments)
28. Show HN: Stagehand – an open source browser automation framework powered by AI (288 points | 74 comments)
29. A swashbuckling tale of Italian software piracy – 1983-1993 (2022) (96 points | 42 comments)
30. Agents Are Not Enough (145 points | 109 comments)
